about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the expansive world of BITGUN Survivors, now featuring an open-world experience filled with exploration, random events, and vampire-survivors inspired gameplay. Navigate through the aftermath of a zombie outbreak, as you adapt to your surroundings and make crucial decisions to ensure your survival. Witness the collapse of civilization, as friends turn against each other and people do whatever it takes to stay alive.



Features:
- Open-world exploration in a dynamic and ever-changing environment
- A vast array of random events and encounters, ensuring no two playthroughs are the same
- Vampire survivor-inspired mechanics, adding a unique twist to the zombie apocalypse genre
- Upgrades and meta progression to enhance your abilities and increase your chances of survival
- Challenging and addictive gameplay that will test your skills and adaptability
- Quick and fun game which you will need to repeat many times until you will be able survive till the end

Explore the unfolding of a zombie apocalypse and watch the civilization fall. Friends turn against each other, and people will do whatever it takes to survive. You are alone in the middle of a zombie horde and your goal is to survive.



Gameplay:
- Top down game with vampire-survivors-like gameplay
- Huge hordes of zombies
- 1 large map
- Shop for permanent upgrades

This is not an easy game. Enemies in BITGUN: Survivors are relentless and unforgiving. If you make a mistake, you will die. There are no second chances. You must be prepared for a challenge, and you must be willing to learn from your mistakes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: The first of its kind open-world vampire-survivors game. Explore a dynamic environment, encounter random events, and adapt to survive a zombie outbreak. With upgrades and challenging gameplay, test your skills and adaptability to increase your chances of survival.
